description: Meeting the Primary Obligations of the Rio Conventions through Strengthening Capacity to Implement Natural Resources Legislation

subproject.description: The project will strengthen the capacity of the Lao PDR to meet the primary obligations of the Rio Conventions through strengthening national and local capacity to implement natural resource legislation with a focus on issues most relevant to the Rio Conventions. The project will review policy and legal framework and further develop tools for operationalize law enforcement. Lessons learned will be identify and use for knowledge sharing. The project will furthermore increase the general awareness of Rio Convention issues and facilitate the integration of gender considerations into natural resource legislation and its implementation.
subproject.title: Enforcement Rio Conventions
